tickets.subject: Need help building the CMS
tickets.issue:
Hey Jeremy,
Can you help me work on the CMS at all this week? The base install is completed, but I need your expertise to make sure I did everything correctly.

comments.comment:
Please don't expose that application publically. I told you I would help when I had time and right now I'm just too busy.
Build it out if you'd like, but...just don't do anything stupid.
Don't worry. I moved it off of the main server and into a container with SSL encryption.

history.description: Jeremy Hammond was set as assignee

tickets.subject: Trudesk API access - Portal
tickets.issue: I'll be looking into tightenting up security permissions this week for the Trudesk integration in the Portal. We'll need to also perform some threat modeling to find out where our weak points are and come up with an action plan to mitigate.

history.description: Jeremy Hammond was set as assignee

tickets.subject: New employee on-boarding - Horace Flaccus
tickets.issue:
We have hired a new Network Engineer and need to get him set up with his credentials and phone before his start date next month.
Please create this account at your earliest convenience.

Thank you.

comments.comment:
Hey Adeanna,
I think Joey is out this week, but I can take care of this. Whats the last 4 digits of his employee ID so I can get his extension set up in the VoIP system?

Thank you! He's all set up and ready to go. When he gets to the office on his first day just have him log into his phone first. I'll leave him a voicemail with his initial credentials for server access. His phone pin code will be 2022 and to get into voicemail he can dial *62

Also...let him know that if he wants to use a desktop soft phone that we've been testing Zoiper with some of our end users.

Changing the status of this ticket to pending until he's been set up and changes his initial credentials.

history.description: Joey Pardella was set as assignee

tickets.subject: Username change
tickets.issue:
I need a handle, man. I mean, I don't have an identity until I have a handle.
How about The Master of Disaster?

comments.comment:
You're hopelss, man. Utterly hopeless.

I'm closing this ticket.

history.description: Jeremy Hammond was set as assignee

tickets.subject: Security risks - Portal
tickets.issue: We need to patch the user profile and admin sections of our Portal ASAP. Why are we continually pushing out functions that haven't been tested by the Infosec team?

comments.comment: Thanks, Jeremy. I agree. This is a big problem.

history.description: Jeremy Hammond was set as assignee
